home.title: RECLAIM YOUR FREEDOM
home.slogan: HI.BIONIC.HAND company is engaged in the design and production of bionic limb prostheses.
home.revolutionaryTechDesc: Advanced engineering solutions for high-precision and highly functional bionic hands.
home.userReviewsDesc: Real stories from people whose lives have been transformed
home.meetTeamDesc: The talented team behind our innovative bionic technology

tech.neuralInterfaceDesc: The direct neural interface enables the user to control the device intuitively and perform natural, lifelike movements, establishing an immediate connection between the human nervous system and the bionic hand.
tech.precisionSensorsDesc: Highly sensitive touch sensors that deliver accurate feedback, allowing the user to feel touch force, pressure, and surface differences in a natural, realistic way.
tech.aiLearningDesc: Machine learning adapts to your unique movement patterns
tech.lightweightDesc: Ergonomic and comfortable for all-day use

reviews.sarah: This bionic hand has completely transformed my life. The precision and natural feel are incredible!
reviews.michael: The technology is truly revolutionary. I can now perform tasks I thought were impossible.
reviews.emma: Amazing product! The team support and the quality of the device exceeded all my expectations.
reviews.title: User Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Read what our users have to say about their experience with hiBionicHand products

team.leadEngineerBio: 15+ years in biomedical engineering. Pioneered neural interface technology.
team.neuralSpecialistBio: Expert in brain-computer interfaces with 12 years of research experience.
team.designerBio: Creating user-centered solutions that combine aesthetics with functionality.
team.researchDirectorBio: Leading cutting-edge research in bionic technology and prosthetics.

about.title: About HI.BIONIC.HAND
about.subtitle: Transforming lives through innovative bionic technology
about.historyDesc: HI.BIONIC.HAND is a company engaged in the design and production of bionic limb prostheses: The idea was born after the 2016 Artsakh war, with the vision of helping the large number of injured people who had undergone amputations.
about.purposeDesc: We believe that losing a limb shouldn't mean losing the ability to live life to its fullest. Our purpose is to empower individuals by restoring not just function, but confidence, independence, and hope.
about.missionDesc: To revolutionize prosthetic technology through cutting-edge innovation, making advanced bionic solutions accessible to everyone who needs them.
about.teamDesc: Our diverse team of engineers, scientists, designers, and medical professionals work together to create life-changing solutions.

milestones.nextGenDesc: HI.BIONIC.HAND multifunctional bionic prostheses are already in use and are helping patients reclaim their freedom
milestones.launchDesc: It took many years of work to implement the idea and bring it to life. At that time, there was still a lack of necessary equipment and comfortable working conditions, but there was a clear goal, and experiments were carried out in order to achieve and realize it.
milestones.expansionDesc: The HI.BIONIC.HAND company had already been established, and work was underway to present the first model.
milestones.trialsDesc: The first prototype model that performed one action at the command of one EMG sensor.
milestones.prototypeDesc: The first production model, HBH-1, entered the testing phase.
milestones.foundationDesc: HI.BIONIC.HAND received the international quality management certification ISO 13485. This certification is awarded to companies engaged in the production of medical devices, where quality and safety comply with international standards and meet the highest requirements.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our range of advanced bionic prosthetics designed to restore natural movement and enhance quality of life
